title: Mirillis Action! 1.16.0 Crack FIX
description:
So, this is an updated crack of Mirillis Action! 1.16.0. (I guess)

Main thing is that now LIVE function is working actually (tested). It didn't work earlier, and that made Simple Recording work buggy.

Other changelog:
- No idea!

Installation:
Just copy and paste files from crack folder to your installation folder (Usually C:->ProgramFiles(x86)->Mirillis->Action!

Additional note:
I also found in original archive "Name Change.reg" file. Usage is simple - edit with notepad (right click on file - "Edit"). Change "LicenceHolder" to whatever you want. Then use it.

Enjoy!
